title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.3 - Vehicle loading or unloading
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.3 - Vehicle loading or unloading

State Regulations

No person permitted to enter upon a public wharf, public
mooring facility, public cargo facility or public storage area or facility at
any Port Authority marine terminal, shall, while upon such area, hire any other
person, there present, to perform loading or unloading of vehicles (other than
railroad cars) unless such other person shall be a person authorized by law to
perform such work at such place as an independent contractor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
